class.name: PIXI.BaseTexture

parameters.name: scaleMode
parameters.help: Should be one of the PIXI.scaleMode consts

class.help: A texture stores the information that represents an image. All textures have a base texture.

public.name: dirty
public.help: Sets all glTextures to be dirty.

public.name: fromCanvas
public.help: Helper function that creates a base texture from the given canvas element.

parameters.name: canvas
parameters.help: The canvas element source of the texture

parameters.name: scaleMode
parameters.help: Should be one of the PIXI.scaleMode consts

public.name: fromImage
public.help: Helper function that creates a base texture from the given image url.\nIf the image is not in the base texture cache it will be created and loaded.

parameters.name: imageUrl
parameters.help: The image url of the texture

parameters.name: scaleMode
parameters.help: Should be one of the PIXI.scaleMode consts

public.name: updateSourceImage
public.help: Changes the source image of the texture

public.name: hasLoaded
public.help: [read-only] Set to true once the base texture has loaded

public.name: height
public.help: [read-only] The height of the base texture set when the image has loaded

public.name: premultipliedAlpha
public.help: Controls if RGB channels should be pre-multiplied by Alpha  (WebGL only)

public.name: scaleMode
public.help: The scale mode to apply when scaling this texture

public.name: source
public.help: The image source that is used to create the texture.

public.name: width
public.help: [read-only] The width of the base texture set when the image has loaded
